description.db:para: This table is used by the Dynamic Routing module to store information about the destinations/gateways where to route calls. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;drouting.html.

column.name: id
column.description: Table primary key, not used by module

column.name: gwid
column.description: GW unique ID - used to link the GW from the routing rules

column.name: strip
column.description: Number of digits to be striped out for the beginning of the username when using this GW/destination

column.name: pri_prefix
column.description: String to prefix the username of RURI when using this GW/destination

column.name: attrs
column.description: Generic string describing GW attributes - this string is to be interpreted from the script

column.name: probe_mode
column.description: 0- No probing; 1-Probe on disable only ; 2-Always probe;

column.name: state
column.description: State of the gateway: 0 - enabled; 1 - permanent disabled; 2 - temporary disabled (probing)

column.name: socket
column.description: Local Socket to be used when sending requests (traffic and probes) to the destination - must be an listener configured in opensips.
